name: Charlotte Pudding
text: On Play Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Big Mom Pirates} type card other than [Charlotte Pudding] or up to 1 [Sanji] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of the deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Big Mom Pirates} type card other than [Charlotte Pudding] or up to 1 [Sanji] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of the deck in any order.

meta.notes: Rarity 'R' is printed in the bottom right corner. The card ID 'OP03-112' is printed in the bottom right corner. The '1' in the top left corner is the cost. The '2000' is the power. The '1000' in the bottom left is the life. The '1000' counter is printed on the left side. The 'Wisdom' attribute is printed in the top right corner.
